channel.title: I give up =(

item.title: I give up =(
item.dc:creator: @pkkid pkkid
item.description:
@pkkid wrote:


Error:

Looking for JDK Compiling scripts Scripts\GhoulKiller.java:68: cannot find symbol symbol : method Category() location: @interface org.rsbot.script.ScriptManifest @ScriptManifest(authors = {"Rohit"}, Category = "Combat", name = "GhoulKiller", version = 1.0, ^ Scripts\GhoulKiller.java:71: GhoulKiller is not abstract and does not override a bstract method onRepaint(java.awt.Graphics) in org.rsbot.event.listeners.PaintLi stener public class GhoulKiller extends Script implements PaintListener, ServerMessageL istener { ^ Scripts\GhoulKiller.java:92: cannot find symbol symbol : variable npcs location: class GhoulKiller RSNPC ghoul = npcs.getNearest(ghoulID); ^ Scripts\GhoulKiller.java:93: cannot find symbol symbol : method doAction(java.lang.String) location: class org.rsbot.script.wrappers.RSNPC ghoul.doAction("Attack"); ^ Scripts\GhoulKiller.java:111: cannot find symbol symbol : variable mouse location: class GhoulKiller mouse.setSpeed(random(10,20)); ^ 5 errors Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .

My code:

@ScriptManifest(authors = {“Rohit”}, Category = “Combat”, name = “GhoulKiller”, version = 1.0,
description = (“ROLEX FT. MAHIR”))

public class GhoulKiller extends Script implements PaintListener, ServerMessageListener {

private final int[] ghoulID = {1218};
private int[] foodID = { 1895, 1893, 1891, 4293, 2142, 291, 2140, 3228,
		9980, 7223, 6297, 6293, 6295, 6299, 7521, 9988, 7228, 2878, 7568,

public boolean attack() {
    if(getMyPlayer().getAnimation() == -1){
    RSNPC ghoul = npcs.getNearest(ghoulID);
    ghoul.doAction("Attack");
    return true;
	} else {
		log.warning("No Ghouls to kill. Waiting.");
		return false;
	}
} 

public int loop() { 
	attack();

return (random(10, 50));
}

public boolean onStart() { 
	if (isLoggedIn()) {
		log("Welcome to Rohit`s GhoulKiller");
		setCameraAltitude(true);
		setCompass('N');
		mouse.setSpeed(random(10,20));
		return true;
	} else {
		log.warning("You must be logged in to START this script.");
		return false;
}

}
}[/code]

How can i fix this?
